mapper.insert: insert into lpost(lpostcategory, userid, lposttitle, lpostcontents, lpostaddr, deadline) values(#{lpostcategory},#{userid},#{lposttitle},#{lpostcontents}, #{lpostaddr}, #{deadline})
mapper.select: SELECT lposttitle, lpostlikecnt FROM lpost where userid=#{userid}
select count(*) from lpost where lposttitle like ('%${keyword}%')
select * from lpost order by lpostnum desc limit #{startRow},#{pageSize}
select max(lpostnum) from lpost where userid=#{userid}
select * from lpost where lpostaddr like ('%${keyword}%')
mapper.update: update lpost set readcount = readcount+1 where lpostnum = #{lpostnum}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM lpost WHERE deadline > NOW() and lpostaddr like '%${userAddrgu}%' ORDER BY deadline ASC LIMIT 4;
